settings_privacy.title: Privacy Policy
settings_privacy.subtitle: How we protect your data
settings_privacy.intro_text: At ChildStory, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
settings_privacy.data_collection_text: We collect information you provide when creating an account, including your name, email, and children's profiles. We also collect usage data to improve our service.
settings_privacy.data_usage_text: Your data is used to personalize stories, improve our AI, and communicate important updates. We never sell your personal information.
settings_privacy.data_sharing_text: We do not share your personal data with third parties except as required by law or to provide our services (e.g., cloud hosting).
settings_privacy.security_text: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data. All stories and personal information are stored securely.
settings_privacy.your_rights_text: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your data at any time. Contact us to exercise these rights.
settings_privacy.contact_text: For privacy concerns, email us at privacy@childstory.app

settings_terms.title: Terms of Service
settings_terms.subtitle: The rules of our magical world
settings_terms.acceptance_text: By using ChildStory, you agree to these terms. If you don't agree, please don't use our service.
settings_terms.use_text: ChildStory is designed for creating personalized children's stories. You must be 18+ to create an account. You're responsible for maintaining account security.
settings_terms.content_text: Stories created using ChildStory belong to you. We retain the right to use anonymized data to improve our AI. You grant us license to store and display your content.
settings_terms.prohibited_text: You may not use ChildStory for illegal activities, harassment, or to create inappropriate content. We reserve the right to remove content that violates our policies.
settings_terms.termination_text: We may terminate accounts that violate these terms. You can delete your account at any time from settings.
settings_terms.disclaimer_text: ChildStory is provided 'as is' without warranties. We're not liable for any damages arising from use of our service.

settings_help.title: Help Center
settings_help.subtitle: We're here to help!
settings_help.faq_how_to_create: How do I create a story?
settings_help.faq_how_to_create_answer: Tap the magic wand button, choose your hero, select themes and lessons, then tap 'Create Magic'! Your personalized story will be ready in seconds.
settings_help.faq_how_to_add_child: How do I add a child profile?
settings_help.faq_how_to_add_child_answer: Go to Settings > Manage Children > Add Child. Choose an avatar, enter their name and age, and you're all set!
settings_help.faq_change_language: How do I change the app language?
settings_help.faq_change_language_answer: Go to Settings > Language and select your preferred language. The app will update immediately.
settings_help.faq_delete_story: How do I delete a story?
settings_help.faq_delete_story_answer: In your Library, tap and hold on a story, then select 'Delete'. You can also swipe left on a story card.
settings_help.faq_offline: Can I use the app offline?
settings_help.faq_offline_answer: Stories you've already created can be read offline. Creating new stories requires an internet connection.
settings_help.faq_subscription_answer: ChildStory offers monthly and yearly plans. You can manage your subscription in Settings > Subscription.
